title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Currently, during text change with word wrap in StyledText, there are multiple unnecessary redraws, resulting in slow performance.
EB: This issue should be resolved so that there is at a maximum only one redraw for each visible line during text change with word wrap.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below:
1. Open the application with StyledText feature enabled.
2. Enable word wrap in the StyledText.
3. Make a change in the text content.
4. Observe the number of redraws that occur during the text change with word wrap enabled.
